com.atmecs.falcon.automation.rest.auth

Class AuthCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atmecs.falcon.automation.rest.auth.AuthCheck

  • public class AuthCheck
extends java.lang.Object
    AuthCheck class provides functionality to get the Access Token and check the token by calling corresponding RESTful resources
    Author:
    nv092106

                                                           throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException,
                                                                  com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException,
                                                                  java.io.IOException
        Purpose: Used to check the validity of the Access Token. The given parameters are required to make necessary REST call to check the token
        Parameters:
        formParams - is the JSONObject type which consists of Form Parameters
        headers - is the JSONObject type which consists of Header Parameters
        uri - is the URI for CheckToken Resource
        Returns:
        the Response Object
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException
